......

I burn the board and cards, and claim the small ashpile my hill.

And now my Gespenst, which is a giant robot, can move once more.

\*uses the Strike spirit command\*

Now you can't evade.

Plasma Stakes set...

**JET! MAGNUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUM!**

I smile while sitting on my comfortable seat, looking down at the petty fights below me. I raise my hand, and order the demolition of the planet below me. We need that interstellar highway after all.

My fleet of planet destroying ships.

your hill

i pop the technobabble. mine.

> 
> Xannari Ferrows, you really need to invest in some protection charms for your deck, it's very powerful but open to direct attack.

Well, you know what they say. A good offense is the best defense.

Class, who can tell me how the Magi were defeated in 2020? Yes Timmy?

It was discovered that the release of proto-ions into the atmosphere had a detrimental effect on their ability to perform what they termed "magic", the protions interrupted the neural pathway between themselves and their environment thus nullifying any enchantments they might "cast"

Yes Timmy, very good, and we keep our proto-ion shield up at all times, so that we are never open to attack.

\*dramatic pause\*

\*alarms\* Proto-ion shield failing

(Honestly, as long as we don't get too pissy, the roleplayed hill is rather fun)

I am a planeswalker! Your attempts to dull our senses may have worked in the past, but you should learn that defeat is not in our dictionary. Minions, passively cast [Army of the damned](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=376250)! Commander [Karona](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=44263), you cast [Mana Bloom](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=253592), whilst I cast [Parallel Lives](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=249662). Once we unleash our wrath on the world, we must reach the [Grove of the Guardian](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=270968) at all costs! I'll go ahead and see if there are any perimeters set up.
